all: can I download firefox 3.0 for ubun: yes, look up ubuntuzilla, it will do it for you all automatic-like.
after I install it, where would I find ubuntuzilla?
it goes into /usr/local/bin, so should be in your path by default. just open a terminal, and type the ubuntuzilla.py command to install firefox

yes, you can reinstall, and the us english is "en-US" :)
